attributes.action: claim back the salary and expenses of John Prescott who I believe has not attended the House of Commons since leaving the Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Precott would appear to be spending most of his time preparing to be succeeded by his son as MP for Hull. Arguably, the claim back should go back over many years as John Prescott has always been a waste of time. Transport 10 year plan for example.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
